data.title: Georgia On My Mind: Celebrating the Music of Ray Charles
data.meta_description:
Ray Charles, a Georgia native, is an American treasure. He transcended racism, cultural upheavals, and spread his music based on gospel, blues,
jazz and country around the world... he is truly the genius!
